The zipper does not inspire confidence, since it seems to be plastic teeth with a metal pull.  I wear this to work, where I need to be comfy and not care if I get dirty. So this hoodie is fine for my purposes, as it is decently comfortable. But I wouldn’t buy again.

So happy to have found a really thick hoodie that has great structure so it makes me look cute in it.

I ordered the coffeegray in a medium and accidentally bought the white in a large. The white was super luxurious super soft and amazing quality and the zipper seemed to be made better. The coffeegray color was the complete opposite- super stiff and rough, thinner than the white one, and zipper was horrible.. also noticeable was the size difference between medium and large- the large was huge like an XL, while the medium was more of a small.
Really cute, comfortable and thick. It’s flattering and feels high quality for the price. I’d definitely consider buying another in a different color.

This jacket is thick and feels really nice. It’s still light enough to wear in the house, but thick enough to wear outside if it’s a little chilly, or even beyond a little chilly. The color looks like the photos and it fits well. I am 5’2” with a short torso, weigh around 130 lbs, and the small fit well and hits just about the middle of my hips. If you’re tall, it will probably look slightly cropped, but not too high. Overall, love it!
I will buy one is another color. Very cute.

It's a heavy weight fabric that's very warm and cozy to wear and it seems to be well constructed, though I haven't washed it yet.

Excellent and adorable! Just received it, put it on, and love it. Will be ordering other colors! 5’8”, around 158, got a medium. Fits a little oversized like I like it. Hood is perfect and not tight. All In all I’m pleased with this purchase !

I absolutely love this jacket. I live in Florida, so I don't really need a heavy jacket and this is a perfect weight for when we get our cooler weather. It feels very soft, keeps me warm and I like the thumb holes too. I bought it in blue and love the color. I would buy another and may do so soon.

Also the thumb holes are a tad bit more comfy on the larger size. I don’t think I’ll use the thumb holes much because they aren’t comfortable (feels a little tight and like the sleeves are maybe not long enough unless my arm is relaxed).  I’m 5’6”, 128 lbs, 34D-26”-37” and I prefer the size large (beige ‘coffee gray’). I ordered the light gray in medium at first, and I planned to return it after trying the beige in size large. But now sweing these photos there’s hardly a difference in the look. So size up if you want a baggier look and feel, don’t be afraid to go bigger. This was the most basic awful looking hoodie I've ever seen.  Starting with the fact that the color looked nothing like the picture of the grey-blue color that I ordered. It looked faded like it had been washed and dried 20 times already. It also didn't have that great feel of about 90% of the hoodies on the market these days from expensive and inexpensive brands. The description says these hoodies are 50/50 poly and cotton. I was hoping for an upgraded dupe feel, but this is just a basic cotton hoodie that you could get at any discount store....honestly some of the discount stores are now carrying some very impressive gym gear/hoodies these days. This is not one of them though. Yikes. Right back to Amazon it goes.

Bought this because I needed a big cozy zippered hoodie for after my mastecomy and I love it so much. I'm 5'2, 160lbs and got the large and it's roomy but still feels flattering. The shorter crop is great when your are shorter height too.

评论概述: My #1 favorite hoodie! The one I always find myself reaching for!
评论详情: SO Comfortable & fits TTS. The inside stayed super soft even after multiple washes!! I sized up to a Medium for an oversized cozy fit, but a Small would have fit me nicely too! Just depends what you want!

I’m 5’2” and 150 lbs, and I ordered a size medium in this jacket. The fit is exactly what I was looking for: slightly oversized but still flattering. It’s the perfect neutral color will go with anything. Great for cool days not super warm or thin.  The fabric feels soft and high-quality, providing a nice balance of warmth and breathability. The inside is cozy, and I love how the cuffs are ribbed—they keep the sleeves in place and add a nice snug feel.  Cons- Slightly long in the sleeves for my height, but I don’t mind since it adds to the cozy, oversized look.  Overall: This jacket has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe. If you’re looking for something stylish, comfy, and practical, I highly recommend it. For reference, the medium fit me perfectly for a relaxed look—great for layering or wearing on its own.
Omg I love this jacketttt. It's so thick and luxury feeling. I have it in black, pink, and light gray! I'm going for the brown one next. True to size and a good piece for your fall/winter wardrobe.

I’m sorry I don’t have any pictures. I got it yesterday morning and had it returned by yesterday afternoon.  The size guide they have connected to the product is inaccurate. I have 5’10 and have to do a lot of research when buying clothes online, meaning i read through the reviews and also measured myself and compared to suits guide. It was still too small on me. So please beware!

Highly recommend - my only caveat is that it is so warm I sometimes get hot in it! Even in the New England fall/winter!

This is very cute and very well-made. I only gave it four stars because it was a bit more cropped than I expected.
This sweatshirt is a nice weight, it’s very warm and the inside is super soft. I am impressed with the quality as it’s better than I expected. I would definitely buy again.

This fleece jacket is surprisingly well made but I looked at the pictures for fit and they apparently show tiny people modeling them which I did not realize.  I am 5'7" tall and not skinny so I ordered an XL for comfort.  The fit on the sleeves and the rest of the jacket is good but it just barely reaches my waist if I stand up straight.  Bending over in it, it easily rises up in the back.  The front length seem fair but I would add 3-4 inches overall.  I doubt I will wear it once I get the one I ordered from a different brand.
You can’t tell this isn’t a lululemon sweatshirt!!! Such great quality at a low price!!
I love this hoodie. I have bought two. And both within 2 months have broken zipper.
Slightly oversized, extremely comfortable. Warm and soft and cute!

评论概述: Too boxy, not worth the price
评论详情: This review is for the "AUTOMET Womens Zip Up Hoodies Fleece Jackets Oversized Sweatshirts Fall Fashion Outfits 2024 Sweaters Winter Clothes" Color: Grey Size: Large  Pros + Price: This sweatshirt was reasonably priced (& on sale) when I purchased it. Still not worth the money.)  Cons - Too big & boxy: Amazon recommended a size Large which is what I purchased. This was oversized beyond reason & just looks a mess & is ill-fitting. A Medium would have been better but may have resulted in shorter arms as the arm-length on this large can stand to be longer. - Thumb holes are wonky: I love a top with thumb holes but, I've found that most manufacturers don't get them right. This Automet brand definitely didn't! I could have cut these slit in the shirt myself as that's all it is. When thumb holes are done this way, it inevitably causes pulling if you stretch your hand/arms in any way. (This is coming from someone tall with long arms. However, I've never had this issue with thumb hole shirts from the large, fruit-sounding brand name so I know there is a right way to add this design feature.) - Zipper: The zipper pull just looks cheap, like something you put on if the original, nicer zipper broke & you needed to replace it. The zipper "teeth" are a darker grey which is nice but this unnecessarily big zipper pull is such a cheap looking silver, like something out of a grab bag or bubble gum machine.  I'm not a connoisseur of clothes from the fruit-sounding name brand but, if this is supposed to be a dupe for one of their pieces, as a few reviewers have noted, then I certainly hope the original version didn't cost a lot. There's nothing special about this sweatshirt in the way it looks or feels to me & could have easily been something on rollback in Walmart for $10. I would not recommend this.
Very soft interior. Solid structure. Have not worn enough to see if it will pill.
This is a good quality item. I am 5' 3 and the cropped fit actually hits at just the right spot. Cozy too.

I have always been the bargain shopper and for clothing, I am a really difficult person to buy online. This zip up did not disappoint one bit and it was a great deal! I am having a really hard time not buying all the colors and have even sent this to friends and family to purchase. If you have this in your cart, please buy it!

This hoodie is nice and thick and is very warm.  I really love the color and style.  I was a little nervous about it being “cropped” but it hits below the belly and is very stylish.  It is over sized which I really like for cooler weather because I can definitely fit a sweater under it.  I read reviews about zipper quality but don’t see an issue.  Overall, I really like this hoodie and may get in another color.

Super cute sweater very soft, but smelled really weird taking it out of the bag smelled like Indian food which I love Indian food, but not the smell of it on my jacket that I just bought better than that really cute

Wow! I’m usually an XL or XXL (I go up to 2X just to have some room) this XL jacket fits with a little room so it’s not like I feel stuffed into it. The fabric is amazing and way thicker than I thought, really good quality! And the inside is very soft and warm. The hood is rounded and isn’t pointed like some hoods are (yikes). It is cropped but not uncomfortable for those who like longer garments, I still feel comfortable wearing it.

Love this sweatshirt. It is a crop therefore I bought a medium so it wasn’t too short. It’s a nice thickness. I’ve washed and dried it several times and there’s no pilling or crazy shrinkage. Will probably buy another one in a different color.
So fluffy and warm! Looks great with a pair of leggings. Washed it without any shrinking.
Feels just like the Lulu jacket. Has thumb holes and is super warm. I love it!
I’m in shock at the quality of this zip up hoodie. It’s thick! True to size, washes great though I do air dry it. I need it in every color!

This zip up sweatshirt is so soft and comfortable - Would love it in more colors and I definitely recommend. The ONLY downfall is that the zipper sometimes hits my cheek and is uncomfortable at times when unzipped. I got a medium for a more comfortable fit - usually a small and i'm sure the small would have also fit just fine.
The fabric is thick, the zipper works great, the hood is wonderful!! Love this and wear it constantly

This sweater is oversized and comfy. True to size. Great quality. If you’re looking for a similar Lulu lemon dupe, this is it. The quality is more like a normal sweater like a fruit of the look or Gideon. It’s still comfy and I would buy again if needed.

Loved the weight and material but the color was not as advertised. 3rd order from this brand where the color is a good 2-3 shades off from what you’re expecting. Colors are very washed out when they’re advertised as somewhat vibrant.  Cropped- was not expecting that.  Ran big in my opinion.

评论概述: Beware: The zipper fell off after two washes
评论详情: I fell in love with this sweater jacket for the warmth and weight of it. The color is nice too and pastel. However, the zipper is plastic which wasn’t a huge dealbreaker at first. Until the second wash when I wore it to work and the zipper was nowhere to be found. I’d return it if I could but my return date has passed.

Pretty basic, very warm and cozy. The fabric is nice and thick. However, the shape is not as pictured, it’s cinched at the bottom, unlike the photo. It’s still a cute shape, just not what was shown in my opinion. Gave it 3 stars for the quality but I’ll be returning.

评论概述: Nice heavyweight hoodie, sleeves barely long enough
评论详情: This is a really nice, warm, thick, cozy hoodie for the money. It does run big. I’m 5’4,” 145 lb, heavier in the butt with smaller shoulders and bust. Small fits me slightly oversized and hits between my waist and hip, so it’s just slightly cropped. I would have looked like I was a drowning in a medium. The small is a good flattering fit - not too big, not too small. I got grey green and it does lean a little more towards mint than the picture but a nice muted/greyed mint. I love it. It does have a plastic zipper. Since other reviews mentioned the zipper breaking and issues with lint, I washed it zipped up and inside out on permanent press cold and put it in the dryer on permanent press. Came out great, no shrinkage and no damage to the zipper. I don’t think anyone would mistake this for a lulu, but it’s still a really nice looking and comfy hoodie. Recommended! ** Sleeves are too short to use the thumbholes. They should really be 2-3 inches longer. They’re acceptable for me at 5’4” but would be too short for anyone with arms even an inch longer than mine.

Don't think about it, buy it. I'm a huge fan of lulu, but we are on a budget. I really wanted another oversize scuba, but just can't stomach the $119 price tag rn. So I thought I would give this a shot. The fit is great!! Perfectly oversized, so just order your usual size. The fabric is the SAME as the lulu one with a beautiful weight and quality. I'm 5'5 185lbs and ordered a large. It's perfectly baggy.
My black leggings is covered with all the furry from the hoodie
nice color.
This jacket is soft and great quality. It’s so cute that my daughter took it and I am ordering another one.
I was pleasantly surprised with how thick the fabric was and very happy with the overall quality of the jacket!

For something like 1/3 of the price this is a great recent purchase. Compared to my nearly identical Lululemon scuba full zip hoodie, this one has two main cons: -the material, particular in the hood, is thick and bulky and it doesn’t lay naturally -the sleeves and so therefore thumb holes in the cuffs are shorter so it pulls a bit and isn’t the most comfortable to use those  Otherwise great value!
Fantastic quality.  Color is perfect. Very comfortable!!! Would buy again
